nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_417
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: As she was about to turn off the music, her father burst into her room and shouted at her, "Can't you turn down the music a little bit?"

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_418
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The owner of the bar kept watching the girl dancing while pretending not to.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_419
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Rock music appealed to Sandy so much that she turned it up, paying no attention to her father's objection.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_420
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: As usual, when his parents don't like what he wears, they start bugging him.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_421
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: At the meeting they discussed how to keep the lines of communication open between teachers and students.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_422
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It makes my blood boil to think of these young boys and girls who are forced by their parents to beg for money along the streets.
